lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Pacific Gas and Electric Co said it expects to record a 470 mln dlr, or 1.25 dlr per share, reduction in 1987 earnings because of the company's decision to change the method used to record Diablo Canyon Nuclear Power Plant revenues.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Pacific Gas said the accounting change was prompted by delays in the receipt of a California Public Utilities Commission decision on the company's 1984 application for rate relief to recover the 5.8 billion dlr cost of constructing units one and two of the Diablo Canyon Nuclear Power Project.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It also said the commission is now awaiting its Public Staff Division's report which will recommend how much of the 5.8 billion dlr investment Pacific Gas should be allowed to recover in rates.
